shadow.name: HALF-HEARTEDNESS
shadow.description: Saying yes when you mean no, chronic uncommitment
shadow.behavioral_signature: Starting but not finishing, perpetual ambivalence
shadow.somatic_signature: Heavy body, energetic depletion, dragging sensation
shadow.thought_pattern: I should commit to this, even though I don't want to.

gift.name: PERSEVERANCE
gift.description: Total commitment to what generates sacral response
gift.somatic_signature: Deep reserves of energy, stamina for the long haul
gift.thought_pattern: My yes is sacred. When I commit, I'm all in.

siddhi.name: DEVOTION
siddhi.description: Complete surrender to life's sacred purpose
siddhi.somatic_signature: Infinite stamina, no separation between self and purpose
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am the commitment. There is no separate me.

inversion_protocols.script: You are not lazy. You are committed to the wrong things. Half-heartedness is your body's wisdom telling you this isn't yours to do. The Sacral knows what it wants to devote to. When you force commitment from the mind, you create internal mutiny. Release what drains you.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Think of your current commitments. Feel which ones create heaviness vs which create energy. Trust the body's response.

experiment.hypothesis: If I quit one draining commitment, energy will return for true devotions.
experiment.action: Identify the commitment that most drains you. Quit it or renegotiate it. Observe energy shift.
